name: search_jokes
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool humor_jokes_and_memes.
Tool description: Humor API lets you search through 50,000 jokes, over 200,000 memes, and gifs. From Chuck Norris, over Knock Knock to Yo Mama jokes, you'll find something for every occasion.
API description: Search for jokes.
See https://humorapi.com/docs/#Search-Jokes for more.

number.description: The number of results to retrieve between 1 and 10. Defaults to 3.

exclude_tags.description: A comma-separated list of tags that the joke must not have. Defaults to 'nsfw'.

max_length.description: The maximum number of characters in the joke. Defaults to 200.

include_tags.description: A comma-separated list of tags that the joke must have. Defaults to 'one_liner'.

keywords.description: A comma-separated list of keywords to search for in jokes. Defaults to 'rocket'.

min_rating.description: The minimum rating between 0 and 10 that the result should have. Defaults to 7.
